overview: Come along as Bel Ami`s adriatic adventure continues on the hellenic paradise, mykonos. The luxury yacht docks, setting Tim Hamilton and Tommy Hansen free to explore the town`s labyrinthine streets, checking out the horny young guys prowling around with their libidos on the loose. You`ll find super-sexy sailor, Brandon Manilow, cruising on the pier. Adorable Josh Elliot cruising the souvenir shops, while hunky Julian Armanis and Tommy Hansen cruise the beaches - their lives intersecting as they quench their sexual cravings. Will boyfriends Tim and Tommy`s relationship survive Mykonos` hedonistic temptations? For now, just be assured that this exciting conclusion to The best selling Greek Holiday part 1 will leave you satisfied in more ways than one.
title: Greek Holiday 2: Cruising Mykonos
